column4: download the ubuntu deb for skype at http://seveas.ubuntulinux.nl. Then sudo dpkg -i /path/to/dab
if you have trouble downloading it, use on of the mirrors listed.
before installing it do a    sudo dpkg -P skype
i got it to start and have logged in,, but how to get to work with my mic and all that..hmm.. tricky..
type echo123 into the call area. It will start an automated conversation to test audio
ok the problem with skype is you only get one shot at it, you will need to stop and start skype
pkill skype && skype &      in a term
device already in use it says in the term... when i try to call someone..
Tools/Options/headsets have look around in this panel and see what you can find...
